title: Members of Congress urge revisions to Treasury’s ‘unworkable’ digital asset tax rules
description:
Several American lawmakers voiced their concerns to the U.S. Treasury regarding a proposed taxation scheme for digital assets in a Nov. 15 letter, citing its potential to stifle innovation and adversely affect the digital asset ecosystem. The letter specifically concerns taxation rules advanced by the Treasury on Aug. 25. In today’s letter, lawmakers called the […]

The post Members of Congress urge revisions to Treasury’s ‘unworkable’ digital asset tax rules appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: SEC Announces ‘Highly Productive’ Year for Crypto Enforcement Actions
description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has published its latest enforcement results relating to crypto assets. “Fiscal year 2023 was another highly productive and impactful year for the SEC’s enforcement efforts relating to crypto asset securities,” the regulator described. “The investing public benefits from the Division of Enforcement’s work as a cop on the […]
